title: Holistic Health Clinic | Beaverton, OR Chiropractic | Naturopathy | Massage
description: Our vision at Holistic Health Clinic in Beaverton, OR is to provide a patient-centered integrated health clinic. Call us now at(503) 395-2386 for an appointment
cleaned_text: Our Mission is to enrich our patients' lives by enhancing their bodies' function and health through an integrated, holistic approach to healing. Our vision is to provide a patient-centered integrated health clinic. Our guiding principles include placing quality first, focusing on the patient, and recognizing that the people are the most valuable asset. We respect the worth of every individual. We treat our patients, our employees, and each other with the utmost respect and reverence. We strive to speak a common language of healthcare despite differences in education and training. 10:00 am - 7:00 pm 10:00 am - 7:00 pm 10:00 am - 7:00 pm 10:00 am - 7:00 pm 10:00 am - 7:00 pm 10:00 am - 5:00 pm 10:00 am - 5:00 pm 4670 SW Washington Ave
